name: dockwatch
description: Dockwatch monitors Docker container lifecycle events and sends notifications via services like Discord, Telegram, or Email. It helps administrators stay informed about container restarts, fails, or updates through webhooks.
features: Lifecycle Monitoring: Track container starts, stops, and restarts. Complete event visibility.
Multi-Channel Notifications: Send alerts via Discord, Telegram, Email, and more. Stay informed everywhere.
Webhook Support: Integrate with custom notification systems. Flexible alerting.
Failure Detection: Get notified when containers fail. Immediate problem awareness.
Update Tracking: Monitor container updates and changes. Stay informed of modifications.
Self-Hosted: Run your own container monitoring. Complete control over alerts.
